description: Gets the evidence folders from a specified assessment in Audit Manager.

parameters.name: assessmentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the assessment.

nested_items.name: evidenceFolders
nested_items.description: The list of evidence folders that the GetEvidenceFoldersByAssessment API returned.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the evidence folder.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The date when the first evidence was added to the evidence folder.

nested_items.name: assessmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the assessment.

nested_items.name: controlSetId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the control set.

nested_items.name: controlId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the control.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the folder that the evidence is stored in.

nested_items.name: dataSource
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Service that the evidence was collected from.

nested_items.name: author
nested_items.description: The name of the user who created the evidence folder.

nested_items.name: totalEvidence
nested_items.description: The total amount of evidence in the evidence folder.

nested_items.name: assessmentReportSelectionCount
nested_items.description: The total count of evidence that's included in the assessment report.

nested_items.name: controlName
nested_items.description: The name of the control.

nested_items.name: evidenceResourcesIncludedCount
nested_items.description: The amount of evidence that's included in the evidence folder.

nested_items.name: evidenceByTypeConfigurationDataCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence that falls under the configuration data category. This evidence is collected from configuration snapshots of other Amazon Web Services such as Amazon EC2, Amazon S3, or IAM.

nested_items.name: evidenceByTypeManualCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence that falls under the manual category. This evidence is imported manually.

nested_items.name: evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence that falls under the compliance check category. This evidence is collected from Config or Security Hub.

nested_items.name: evidenceByTypeComplianceCheckIssuesCount
nested_items.description: The total number of issues that were reported directly from Security Hub, Config, or both.

nested_items.name: evidenceByTypeUserActivityCount
nested_items.description: The number of evidence that falls under the user activity category. This evidence is collected from CloudTrail logs.

nested_items.name: evidenceAwsServiceSourceCount
nested_items.description: The total number of Amazon Web Services resources that were assessed to generate the evidence.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's used to fetch the next set of results.
